snippet: Despite higher hotel prices and rising travel demand, there are plenty of online tools to help keep your vacation expenses in check.
abstract: Michelle Higgins Practical Traveler column on using online tools to keep vacation expenses in check.
lead_paragraph: Despite higher hotel prices and rising travel demand, there are plenty of online tools to help keep your vacation expenses in check.

headline.seo: 19 Web Sites for Travel Savings in 2012
